properties.description: Sink table for the insert branch of  the dataflow
This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

sources.name: ThesaurusTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms

sources.name: TaxonomyTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms

sources.name: TermTypes
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes

sinks.name: TaxonomyTermsInsert
sinks.script:
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID = TermTypeID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert

sinks.name: DeleteSink
sinks.script:
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DimID'],
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> DeleteSink

sinks.name: UpdateTerm
sinks.script:
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

transformations.name: ConvertDimIDToTypeID
transformations.script: Filter1 derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID

transformations.name: LookupTypesWithDimID
transformations.script:
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
Select1 split(isNull(DimID),
	not(isNull(TermID)) && not(isNull(DimID)),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Delete, Update, Insert)

transformations.name: SelectForDelete
transformations.script:
ConditionsForDelete select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForDelete

transformations.name: AddAvailableCol
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@Delete derive(Available = false()) ~> AddAvailableCol

transformations.name: ConditionsForDelete
transformations.script: AddAvailableCol alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForDelete

transformations.name: ConvertNameAndDesc
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc

transformations.name: ConditionsForUpdate
transformations.script: ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID))&&not(isNull(TermDimID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionsForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		TermDescription = DimDescription,
		TermPreferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID,
		TermID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: TermIdIsNull
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit1@Insert filter(isNull(TermID)) ~> TermIdIsNull

transformations.name: SetAvailable
transformations.script:
TermIdIsNull derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable

transformations.name: LookupTypeWithRootID
transformations.script:
SetAvailable, TermTypes join(RootID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID

transformations.name: SelectFromLookup
transformations.script:
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID,
		Available
	))~> SelectFromLookup

transformations.name: ConditionsForInsertion
transformations.script: LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(DimID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
ConditionsForInsertion select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		TermCode,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: ThesaurusTerms filter(DimID == 11949) ~> Filter1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
MergeJoin select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID,
		TermID,
		TermDimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available = TaxonomyTerms@Available,
		TermTypeID
	))~> Select1

sources.name: TurasDimensionTables
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as long,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TurasDimensionTables

sources.name: TaxonomyDimensionTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms

sources.name: LookupType
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType

sinks.name: SinkIntoTermTaxonomy
sinks.script:
Filter1 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		Preferred,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Available = DimActive,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy

sinks.name: DeleteTerm
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	)) ~> DeleteTerm

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
MarkForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		Description,
		Available = DimActive
	)) ~> UpdateSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
TurasDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: DerivedColumn
transformations.script: ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> DerivedColumn

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID = LookupType@TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	))~> SelectForDeletion

transformations.name: MarkForDeletion
transformations.script: SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update select(mapColumn(
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID
	))~> SelectForUpdate

transformations.name: MarkForUpdate
transformations.script: SelectForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> MarkForUpdate

transformations.name: AlterRow1
transformations.script: SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TermID))) ~> AlterRow1

transformations.name: Filter1
transformations.script: AlterRow1 filter(not(isNull(TermTypeID))) ~> Filter1
